title: Talking about Trouble - final paragraph serves to

content.prompt: In the context of the passage as a whole, the final paragraph serves to

choices.label: qualify the earlier argument by considering the value of directly engaging one's troubles
persuade the audience by demonstrating facility with contemporary psychological theory
outline some of the difficulties that the author's discussion leaves unresolved
note a contradiction in the author's advice about exercising discretion

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
